mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( idx, profile_image_location, email, password, name, nick_name, phone_number, sex, user_year, user_month, user_day, type, gall_count, user_subscribe_count, auth_key ) VALUES ( NEXTVAL(idx), #{profileImageLocation}, #{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sex}, #{userYear}, #{userMonth}, #{userDay}, #{type}, #{galleryCount}, #{userSubscribeCount}, #{authKey} )
